TopicTitle: How to assign Kerbals for a mission?

Articles.Content: I use Crew Manifest, but the new 0.21 update said that now I can manage Kerbals and assign them. How do I do that?
There's a new tab in the VAB. It will bring up a number of slots that you can fill with available Kerbals, who you have to hire from the Astronaut Complex.

1) Hire some astronauts from the astronaut complex.

2) Build your rocket.

3)Open the third tab, next to the "building" and "action groups" one.

4)Assign said astronauts.
The icon is the one with the silhouette of a Kerbal.
